I was the primary developer for a db-driven site for film students to organize their projects. This was in PHP + MySQL + CodeIgnitor. I worked on this through a successfull launch and subsequent maintenance while I was taking classes.

Projects

  • BeanSpeed.com
  • github.com/kkuchta/coffeewifi
A rails + backbone site for comparing the wifi speeds at nearby coffeeshops. Uses google maps, the yelp api, and a speed-test tool.
  • Vimbits.com
  • github.com/kkuchta/vimbits
A Rails site for trading snippets of Vim configuration I did to scratch my own itch. Browse 'top', 'hot', 'new', and 'random' vimrc snippets. Has user account, tags, code highlighting.
  • Other Projects
SFRentalApp.com, a JS Physics Engine, an infinite-scrolling random Imgur wall, a social-media campaign manager, a crime-rate service called "Danger Zone", a facebook collage maker (on a 5-person team), Ubimenu, mobile menus as a service.
